para.1: Kuti tipite patsogolo kwenikweni m’moyo wathu wauzimu timadziwa kuti tikufunikira gwero lodalirika la nzeru.
para.2: Kudina pazithunzi zomwe zili m'munsizi zidzakuyambitsani panjira yopezera nzeru zamuyaya zomwe Mulungu akufuna kuti mudziwe ndikutsata.

para.1: Nkhaniyi imayamba ndi nthawi isanakhalepo anthu. Kenako yafotokoza nkhani ya momwe anthu awiri oyamba adalumikizirana ndi Mulungu."
para.2: Sonkhanitsani abwenzi anu ndikuwerenga momwe Mulungu adakonzera anthu kubwera kwa Yesu ndi Nzeru zake.
para.3: Sankhani chilankhulo chomwe mumakonda podina padziko lonse lapansi pamwambapa.

para.1: Izi ndi zina mwa zinthu zimene Yesu ndi otsatira ake oyambirira anaphunzitsa.
para.2: Anthu ambiri aona kuti moyo wawo wasintha pamene anapempha Yesu kuti awapatse mphamvu zogwiritsa ntchito zimene Yesu anaphunzitsa.
para.3: Sonkhanitsani anzanu ndikuwona zomwe mwapeza pamene mukukambirana mafunso otsatirawa.
para.4: Sankhani chilankhulo chomwe mumakonda podina padziko lonse lapansi pamwambapa.

para.1: Yesu ndiye gwero la nzeru zosatha. Mukamaonera vidiyoyi, dzifunseni kuti: “Kodi Yesu anachita chiyani komanso ankaphunzitsa chiyani?
para.2: Vidiyoyi ikupezeka m’zinenero zambiri. Kuti musinthe chilankhulo dinani dziko lapansi pamwambapa.
